body:
Half-Orc Parents
d%Result
01—10Both of your parents are alive.
11—35Only your father is alive.
36—60Only your mother is alive.
61—100Both of your parents are dead. You gain access tothe Orphaned social trait.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Character Background/Background Generator/Step 1-Homeland/Family/and Childhood/Half-Orc/Half-Orc Parents
name: Half-Orc Parents
